abstract.p: Dermatologist Dr Jerome Z Litt letter on July 1 article gives helpful and witty suggestions for outsmarting mosquitoes and therefore avoiding bites (S)

block.p: About avoiding mosquito bites (''Don't Get Stung: Outsmarting the Mosquito,'' July 1), there are some time-honored ways: avoid scented products like colognes and hair sprays because odors attract mosquitoes; wear light-colored smooth fabrics instead of bright prints or dark rough clothing, which attract mosquitoes; avoid bright jewelry and other metal objects, which mosquitoes find alluring; keep screens in good repair; avoid stacking firewood and compost heaps against your home; keep garbage cans covered; and, because mosquitoes are attracted to carbon dioxide, you could try talking as little as possible while outdoors.
DR. JEROME Z. LITT Beachwood, Ohio
